title: Cyberpunk Neko
colorScheme: Neon pink and electric blue on black background
targetAudience: Gamers, anime fans, cyberpunk enthusiasts, tech-savvy individuals
designElements: A stylized, pixelated Maneki Neko (lucky cat) wearing a cyberpunk headset. Glitch effects around the edges. Binary code as background noise. Futuristic Japanese characters incorporated into the design. Neon glowing details.
aiPrompt: Create a cyberpunk style pixel art illustration of a Maneki Neko wearing a gaming headset with neon glowing details, glitch effects, and binary code background. Use neon pink and electric blue on a black background. Include futuristic Japanese characters.

originalAnalysis.targetAudience: Young adults, streetwear enthusiasts, people interested in Japanese culture

title: Cyberpunk Glitch Hand
colorScheme: Neon green, Electric blue, Black, White
targetAudience: Gamers, Tech enthusiasts, Science fiction fans, Urban dwellers
designElements: A stylized hand made of digital glitches and geometric shapes, circuitry patterns, binary code, holographic effect
aiPrompt: Create a cyberpunk-style T-shirt design featuring a hand composed of digital glitches and circuit patterns. Use neon green, electric blue, black, and white colors. Incorporate elements of binary code and holographic effects to give it a futuristic and technological feel. The overall mood should be energetic and dynamic.

originalAnalysis.targetAudience: Teenagers, Young adults, Alternative fashion enthusiasts

title: Celestial Bubbles
colorScheme: Deep blues and purples as a background, with lighter pastel shades of pink, yellow, and orange for the bubbles to mimic planets.
targetAudience: Space enthusiasts, science lovers, those who appreciate abstract art, and people who like unique designs.
designElements: Stylized, simplified planetary orbs and smaller water droplets, against a deep space background gradient. The bubbles could have subtle textures resembling planetary surfaces.
aiPrompt: Create a graphic design of stylized planetary orbs resembling bubbles, set against a deep blue and purple space gradient background with subtle textures and highlights.

originalAnalysis.targetAudience: People interested in art, science, or unique patterns; possibly children or young adults.
originalAnalysis.technique: Photography, Possibly oil and water mixture

title: Airport Code Tee
colorScheme: White T-shirt with Navy or Dark Grey Text, or Black T-shirt with white Text
targetAudience: Adults, travelers, aviation enthusiasts, those with a sense of humor
designElements: Airport Code (e.g., JFK, LAX, LHR) inside parentheses, positioned where the original 'HOTEL' text is. Use a clean, sans-serif font like Helvetica or Arial. Optionally, subtle line drawing of an airplane taking off could be included above the code.
aiPrompt: Create a minimalist t-shirt design. The design features a white or black short-sleeve t-shirt. The graphic element is the three-letter airport code 'JFK' inside parentheses, rendered in a clean, sans-serif font like Helvetica or Arial. The text should be Navy Blue or Dark Grey if the shirt is white, and white if the shirt is black. Place the text on the upper chest.

title: Mountain Majesty Silhouette
colorScheme: Monochromatic or duotone -  a dark color such as navy or black for the mountain silhouette and a lighter color such as cream or white for the background/sky.
targetAudience: Hikers, climbers, nature lovers, people who appreciate minimalist design.
designElements: A stylized silhouette of a mountain range similar to the one in the image, with a stylized eagle or mountain goat silhouette incorporated into the design or placed above the mountain. A subtle vintage texture overlay can add character.
aiPrompt: Create a minimalist, graphic T-shirt design. Feature a silhouetted mountain range with a stylized eagle flying above. Use a duotone color scheme of dark navy and cream. Add a subtle vintage texture overlay.

originalAnalysis.technique: Photography, potentially layered with digital effects

title: Cosmic Librarian
colorScheme: Navy blue, Cream, Gold accents, Purple nebula background
targetAudience: Students, Teachers, Book lovers, Sci-fi fans
designElements: Stack of books forming a rocket, Stars, Planets, Reading glasses, Quill pen, Nebula background
aiPrompt: Create a T-shirt design featuring a stack of books arranged as a rocket ship blasting off into a nebula. The rocket is adorned with reading glasses and a quill pen. Use a vintage, graphic illustration style with a navy blue, cream, gold, and purple color scheme. The design should evoke a sense of adventure and intellectual curiosity, targeting book lovers and sci-fi fans.

title: Retro Robotics Team
colorScheme: Navy Blue, Gold, Off-White (for distressed look)
targetAudience: Robotics team members, STEM students, School community
designElements: A stylized robot head composed of geometric shapes, banner with the team name "Cyber Titans" in a retro font, year of establishment (e.g., "Est. 2024"), circuit board patterns subtly incorporated, distressed texture.
aiPrompt: Create a vintage-style T-shirt design for a high school robotics team called "Cyber Titans." The design should feature a geometric robot head, the team name in a retro font, and the year of establishment. Use a navy blue and gold color scheme with a distressed texture.

title: Bloom Where You're Planted
colorScheme: Earthy tones like olive green, burnt orange, and cream or beige. Alternatively, a dark background with pastel colors for contrast.
targetAudience: Young adults and adults interested in mindfulness, gardening, and personal development. Also, for those who appreciate bohemian and nature-inspired aesthetics.
designElements: Hand-lettered font with floral accents (leaves, small stylized flowers) incorporated within or around the text. A small potted plant graphic could be used to emphasize the 'planted' aspect. Text arranged in a circular or organic flowing pattern.
aiPrompt: Create a T-shirt design with the phrase 'Bloom Where You're Planted' using a hand-lettered font. Incorporate botanical elements such as leaves and small stylized flowers. Use earthy tones like olive green, burnt orange, and cream. The design should evoke feelings of resilience and personal growth. Arrange the text in a flowing, organic pattern.

originalAnalysis.targetAudience: Adults, Individuals seeking motivation and positive affirmation
originalAnalysis.technique: Screen printing or Direct-to-garment printing, Text layout design

title: Sustainable Futures Club
colorScheme: Earthy greens, browns, creams, with a pop of bright blue (representing water). Use muted tones.
targetAudience: University students, Environmental clubs, eco-conscious individuals
designElements: Stylized illustration of a hand holding a seedling sprouting from the earth, surrounded by a circular geometric pattern representing interconnectedness and sustainability. The club name integrated into the design in a clean, sans-serif font.
aiPrompt: Create a minimalist T-shirt design featuring a hand holding a seedling sprouting from the earth. Surround the image with a circular geometric pattern in muted earth tones (greens, browns, creams) with a pop of bright blue. Include the text 'Sustainable Futures Club' in a clean, sans-serif font below the image. The overall style should be modern and convey a message of environmental awareness.

originalAnalysis.theme: Team/Group Identity, Activity Based, Event Focused
originalAnalysis.technique: Screen printing or Direct-to-Garment printing, featuring vector graphics

title: Fractured Landscape
colorScheme: Deep teal, burnt orange, charcoal gray, with a touch of neon green as an accent.
designElements: A fractured landscape design on the front, resembling mountains and rivers. The geometric shapes are formed by pixelated patterns, creating a glitch effect. Incorporate small, stylized icons of nature elements (trees, birds) within the geometric shapes. The back of the shirt features a subtle, repeating pattern of binary code.
aiPrompt: Generate a T-shirt design with a fractured landscape pattern using geometric shapes and pixelated effects. The color scheme should be deep teal, burnt orange, and charcoal gray with a touch of neon green. Incorporate small, stylized icons of nature elements (trees, birds) within the geometric shapes. The back should feature a repeating pattern of binary code.

originalAnalysis.targetAudience: Athletes, Gamers, People who like bold designs
